flawed_nl_solution:
Mara has 150 - 40 = <<150-40=80>>80 cards.
Janet has 80/2 = <<80/2=40.0>>40.0 cards since Mara has twice as many as Janet.
Brenda has 40.0 - 9 = <<40.0-9=31.0>>31.0 cards since Janet has 9 cards more than Brenda.
Therefore, they all have 80 + 40.0 + 31.0 = <<80+40.0+31.0=151.0>>151.0 cards.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 110, not 80. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
